newsitem.title: USA: U.S. rejects Kabila deadline for refugees.
newsitem.headline: U.S. rejects Kabila deadline for refugees.

text.p: The United States on Monday rejected a 60-day deadline given to the United Nations by Zairean rebel leader Laurent Kabila for evacuation of refugees.

To put such a deadline on the United Nations was "unreasonable...and unacceptable," especially when Kabila and his rebel alliance had delayed cooperating with refugee evacuation efforts for weeks, State Department spokesman Nicholas Burns said.
